@graph.name: Comparative gene analysis
@graph.description:
Workflows for comparison of genes in annotated genomes

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Comparative gene analysis in unannotated genomes](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/genome-annotation/tutorials/gene-centric/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
